channel.title: Board of Directors on Business Directory
channel.description: Recent content in Board of Directors on Business Directory

item.title: Ms. Angenie Jairam
item.description:
About Ms. Jairam

Angenie Jairam, often known as Ms Jairam, is deeply committed to making a significant impact in the healthcare sector. As a Medical Gas Specialist and Certified Medical Gas Inspector with expertise in Disease and Infection Control, she is driven by the mission to ensure safety and excellence for patients. She specializes in designing, supplying, and installing medical gas equipment that adheres to the rigorous standards and regulations in Trinidad and Tobago and internationally.

item.title: Anthony Da Costa
item.description:
About Mr. Da Costa

Anthony Da Costa is an enthusiastic entrepreneur with a rich background in the oil and gas sector. His journey from technician to business owner exemplifies his dedication to growth and innovation. As Vice President of the Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce, he brings both technical expertise and entrepreneurial insight to the organization.

Professional Journey

Early Beginnings

  • Started repairing speakers and electronics at age 11
  • Completed trade studies as an electrical technician at Metal Industries Company (MIC)

Oil and Gas Career

  • Joined Trinmar Operations in 2001 as an apprentice
  • Advanced to Electrical Instrumentation Technician
  • Over 13 years of experience in the sector

Entrepreneurial Success

Founded Jus Hurtz LTD in 2013:

item.title: Ms. Dawn Daniel
item.description:
About Ms. Daniel

Dawn Daniel brings 30 years of experience as a director in her family-owned catering business. With a Bachelor of Arts in Business Administration, she combines academic knowledge with practical business experience to excel in strategic planning and management.

Professional Experience

Catering Business Leadership

  • Director of family-owned catering business for 30 years
  • Oversees strategic planning and management of kitchen facilities
  • Manages contract with the School Feeding Programme
  • Specializes in event coordination and business growth

Education

  • Bachelor of Arts in Business Administration

Community Involvement

Dawn is deeply passionate about:

item.title: Mrs. Natasha Michelle Yatali-Harridass
item.description:
About Mrs. Yatali-Harridass

Michelle brings 23 years of nursing experience and a deep commitment to elderly care. As the manager of Precious Life Elderly Care for the past 11 years, she has dedicated her career to enhancing the quality of life for seniors in her community.

Professional Experience

Healthcare Leadership

  • Manager of Precious Life Elderly Care (11 years)
  • 23 years of nursing experience
  • Secretary of Trinidad and Tobago Residential Care Association (TTRCA) for 5 years

Chamber Involvement

  • Joined The Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce in 2022
  • Active committee member
  • Elected as Assistant Secretary
  • Focuses on business community development

Agricultural Pursuits

Since 2019, Michelle has expanded into agriculture:

item.title: Mrs. Sandra Ramjit
item.description:
About Mrs. Ramjit

Sandra Ramjit brings over 30 years of experience in finance, audit, taxation, and insurance. With extensive international experience serving clients across Central America and the Caribbean, she combines professional expertise with a passion for empowering others.

Professional Qualifications

  • MBA specializing in Strategic Planning
  • Fellowship of the Association of Chartered Certified Accountants (UK)
  • Chartered Accountant of Trinidad & Tobago
  • Certified Financial Services Professional

Professional Experience

Business Leadership

  • Founder and CEO of Simple WOW Solutions Limited
    • Business coaching and consulting
    • Professional training
    • Strategic guidance
  • Sales Representative at Guardian Life of the Caribbean Limited
    • Personal and business asset protection
    • Financial planning services

Chamber Involvement

  • Member since 2019
  • Former Vice President (2022)
  • Current Treasurer

Community Service

  • Volunteer tutor with Adult Literacy Tutors Association (ALTA)
  • Over 2 years of service in adult education
  • Focused on empowering individuals through education

Expertise

  • Financial Management
  • Strategic Planning
  • Business Coaching
  • Insurance Services
  • Professional Training
  • International Business

As Treasurer of the Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce, Sandra brings her extensive financial expertise and strategic planning skills to ensure sound fiscal management and growth of the organization.

item.title: Ms. Kavita Dabiedeen
item.description:
About Ms. Dabiedeen

Kavita Dabiedeen is a dynamic professional with extensive experience in public service, marketing, and community development. Her diverse background includes roles in politics, youth development, and business, making her an effective advocate for growth and opportunity.

Professional Experience

Political Career

  • Opposition Senator in the Parliament of Trinidad and Tobago (2009)
  • Youth Officer for Oropouche West Constituency (2008-2010)
  • Represented Trinidad and Tobago at Commonwealth Youth Forum (2009)

Current Roles

  • Marketing Manager at DNA & Associates Ltd.
  • Financial Advisor and Insurance Agent at Maritime Financial Group
  • Former Sales and Marketing Manager at Aditya Enterprises

Chamber Leadership

  • Active member since July 2022
  • Public Relations Officer
  • Team Lead for fyzabad.org website project
  • Collaborated on skill training workshop with Police Youth Club

Personal Achievements

  • Competed in Miss Fyzabad Carnival Queen Pageant (2007)
    • Won Miss Congeniality
    • Won Most Improved Award
  • Passionate creator of eggless and flourless healthy desserts

Core Values

  • Commitment to authenticity
  • Belief in kindness opening doors
  • Service to others as service to God
  • Community-focused initiatives

Expertise

  • Public Relations
  • Marketing Strategy
  • Financial Advisory
  • Youth Development
  • Community Engagement
  • Project Leadership

As Public Relations Officer of the Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce, Kavita brings her marketing expertise and community engagement experience to enhance the chamber’s outreach and impact.

item.title: Mr. Randy Sinanan (AAL)
item.description:
About Mr. Sinanan

Randy Sinanan is a practicing Attorney at Law with over ten years of experience in both public and private sectors. His commitment to legal excellence and community development makes him a valuable asset to both his profession and the community he serves.

Professional Experience

Legal Practice

  • Over 10 years of experience in public and private sectors
  • Specializes in Civil and Family Law
  • Serves on various State Boards
  • Focuses on upholding good corporate governance

Community Service

  • Active member of 141 Homeless Foundation
  • Member of Rotary Club of Princes Town
  • Long-standing member of The Fyzabad Chamber of Commerce

Areas of Focus

  • Civil Law
  • Family Law
  • Corporate Governance
  • Community Development
  • Public Service

Professional Philosophy

Mr. Sinanan is driven by:

item.title: Mr. Chris Shamrule
item.description:
About Mr. Shamrule

Chris Shamrule brings over 23 years of experience in the general contracting industry, starting his journey at age 17. As Managing Director of the Marine and Land Group of Companies for the past 15 years, he combines his industry expertise with strong business acumen.

Professional Experience

Business Leadership

  • Managing Director, Marine and Land Group of Companies (15 years)
  • Expertise in general contracting and project management
  • Background in Marketing and Sales Management
  • Certified in Safety and Lubrication Engineering

Industry Journey

  • 23 years of experience in general contracting
  • Started career at age 17
  • Progression from marketing to company leadership
  • Focus on safety and efficiency in operations

Chamber Involvement

  • Active member for over 4 years
  • Served on the Board of Directors
  • Contributes to community development initiatives

Professional Philosophy

Chris believes in:

item.title: Mr. Andy Samaroo
item.description:
About Mr. Samaroo

Andy Samaroo is a skilled craftsman with over 30 years of experience in cobbling and leathercraft. As the owner of Shoe Lab, he has turned his passion for artisanal craftsmanship into a successful business that serves the Fyzabad community.

Professional Journey

Entrepreneurial Success

  • Owner of Shoe Lab for over 30 years
  • Located on Guapo Main Road, Fyzabad
  • Specializes in shoe repairs and custom leather items
  • Started leathercrafting at age 17

Education

  • Graduate of Fyzabad Composite School
  • Majored in Visual Arts and Tailoring
  • Self-taught leather craftsman

Chamber Involvement

  • Member since 2019
  • Currently serves on the Board of Directors
  • Advocates for local entrepreneurs
  • Supports small business development

Expertise

  • Shoe Repair
  • Leathercraft
  • Custom Leather Items
  • Sustainable Craftsmanship
  • Small Business Management
  • Artisanal Production

Business Philosophy

Committed to:

item.title: Ms. Sharon James
item.description:
About Ms. James

Sharon James brings a unique blend of technical expertise and culinary entrepreneurship to her role. With over 33 years in the optical industry and 16 years as a successful restaurant owner, she exemplifies the spirit of diversification and growth in business.

Professional Experience

Optical Industry

  • 33+ years as an Optical Lab Technician
  • Technical expertise in precision work
  • Commitment to quality and attention to detail

Culinary Entrepreneurship

  • Founder and Owner of SHAR’S BAKE AND SHARK (16 years)
  • Started with two tents, expanded to dedicated building
  • Built business from ground up
  • Previous experience in catering industry

Business Growth

  • Successfully transformed home-based business into established restaurant
  • Demonstrated entrepreneurial vision
  • Proven track record of business expansion
  • Focus on quality and customer satisfaction

Chamber Involvement

  • Member since 2019
  • Three years as general member
  • Board Director for past three years
  • Active contributor to community initiatives

Business Philosophy

Committed to:
